item.title: [刷题]LeetCode每日一题
item.description: 2021 1月 01.01[312. Burst Balloons] 传送门 You are given n balloons, indexed from 0 to n - 1. Each balloon is painted with a number on it represented by an array nums. You are asked to burst all the balloons. If you burst the ith balloon, you will get nums[i - 1] * nums[i] * nums[i + 1] coins. If i - 1 or i + 1
